title: Crew Show w/ Vinny Russo
description:
It's the TST crew! Matt built a LEGO Porsche RSR, we talk about Batmobile suspension geometry, and Vinny has been driving a 6-wheeled Hennessey pickup truck. 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/BpsQrqhsthI

 

Use code "TST175" for $175 off a purchase at Crown and Caliber 

Use code "smoke20" to get 20% off the Thinkware dash cam: https://us.thinkware.com/

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @vinnyrusso1

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
